abstract: Are the data of an edition means to a particular and privileged presentation, or is the presentation a side effect? Because of the changing nature of computer systems, with constant progression in hardware and software, the encoded texts are the most important long-term outcome of the project—the representation of the knowledge— and presentation within a particular application is destined to become obsolete relatively quickly.
article_title: Challenging the Myth of Presentation in Digital Editions
journal_title: Journal of the Text Encoding Initiative
